titleStmt.title: A treatise relating to the worship of God divided into six sections / by John Templer ...
titleStmt.author: Templer, John, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. N. for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Pages 9-10 are torn with some loss of text ; pages 28, 72 and 73 have faded print. Beginning-page 75 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.

I. The nature of Divine worship -- II. The peculiar object of worship -- III. The true worshippers of God -- IV. Assistance requisite to worship -- V. The place of worship -- VI. The solemn time of worship.
